title: Glowing Snail
summaries: The Glowing Snail is an uncommon critter that only spawns in Glowing Mushroom biomes. It is also quite large compared to its normal counterpart. The Glowing Snail has only 5 health and no defense, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

The Glowing Snail can be caught with any <linked>Bug Net</linked> to be carried around in the <linked>inventory</linked> and released later, or crafted into animated decorative <linked>furniture</linked> (<linked>Glowing Snail Cage</linked>). Once crafted, the Glowing Snail cannot be released again.
The Glowing Snail can be used as <linked>bait</linked> for <linked>fishing</linked>, with 15% bait power.

The Glowing Snail can be spawned by the <linked>Snail Statue</linked>, however statue-spawned critters cannot be caught with any Bug Net, and will disappear in a puff of smoke when the player attempts to do so.

statistics.Sell: 50 SC
